description: Legislation expected after social media footage shows weekend crowds drinking in Irish city centres.
title: Coronavirus: New fines likely for outdoor drinkers in Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus: New fines likely for outdoor drinkers in Ireland - BBC News
maintext: It is understood ministers are unlikely to agree to an initial suggestion that pubs should be banned from selling takeaway alcohol after concerns were expressed about the impact such a measure would have in rural Ireland.
